PathOfBuilding.Notes:
helmet : sniper's, pcoc, wave
boots : hextouch, sniper's, pcoc

bows: arrows : of splrinteing (1), of many (2) flat ele / phys % ele / phys attack speed crit / multi
quivers: arrows : warlord, shaper, corrupted, synthesised, life % ele crit / multi
Lioneye's paws 30 - RoA, hextouch, hex, lgoh, innervate, onslaught, Glutonny Belt 48 - 100 life, cull, lgoh, mgoh cwdt, brand, pcoc
